name: Alolan Exeggutor V
author: MUGENUP

attacks.name: Growing Tall
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 5 {G} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Head Swing
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon for each {G} Energy attached to this Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
